oai_dc:dc.dc:title: USCT muster roll for Mississippi soldiers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Muster roll for Capt. Zina B. Chatfield's Co. F, 58th Inf. Regt., United States Colored Troops. These troops were recruited in the vicinity of Natchez and Vicksburg, Miss. Chatfield enlisted in Co. A, 4th Minn. Inf. Regt. on September 27, 1861. He was commissioned an officer in Co. F., 58th Inf. Regt., USCT, on September 29, 1863. He mustered out on April 30, 1866.
